查询指定k8s服务器上的所有命名空间
api: http://cmdbUrl//api/k8sNamespaces?k8sApiUrl={k8sApiUrl}&k8sAuthToken={k8sAuthToken}
实例:http://10.130.41.218:8086/cmdb/api/k8sNamespaces?k8sApiUrl=https://10.130.41.218:6443&k8sAuthToken=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IkQwUFZRU3Vzano0cS03eWxwTG8tZGM1YS1aNzdUOE5HNWNFUXh6YThrUG8ifQ..emXO4luNDCozenbvjxAmk4frqzrzpJzFbn-dBV6lLUjXhuRKWbrRbflko_6Xbwj5Gd1X-0L__a_q1BrE0W-e88uDlu-9dj5FHLihk1hMgrBfJiMiuKLQQmqcJ2-XjXAEZoNdVRY-LTO7C8tkSvYVqzl_Nt2wPxceWVthKc_dpRNEgHsyic4OejqgjI0Txr_awJyjwcF-mndngivX0G1aucrK-RRnM6aj2Xhc9xxDnwB01cS8C2mqKApE_DsBGTgUiCWwee2rr1D2xGMqewGE-LQtQfkb05hzTNUfJRwaKKk6Myby7GqizzPci0O3Y4PwwKFDgY04CI32acp6ltA1cA
备注:k8sApiUrl是k8s的api url例如https://10.130.41.218:6443， k8sAuthToken是k8s的访问认证token

查询指定平台在k8s的命名空间信息
api: http://cmdbUrl/cmdb/api/k8sNamespaces/{platformId}
实例：http://10.130.41.218:8086/cmdb/api/k8sNamespaces/123456-wuph
备注：platformId必须是cmdb已经存在的平台且平台类型为K8S_CONTAINER
